         RELEASE.iNFORMATION
    
    &sup3;TiTLE.......: HAMBURGER HILL                                 
    &sup3;DVD.DATE....: 12/10/04                                       
    &sup3;GENRE.......: DRAMA/WAR/ACTION                               
    &sup3;RUNTiME.....: 109 MiNUTES                                 
    &sup3;DVD.SOURCE..: RETAiL DVD5                                
    
    &sup3;RELEASE.DATE: 12/22/04

    &sup3;NR.OF.RARS..: 89x50MB

    &sup3;iMDB.SCORE..: 6.4/10 (2,268 VOTES)                           
    
   
       PLOT A brutal and realistic war film focuses on the lives   
        of a squad of 14 U.S. Army soldiers of B Company, 3rd  
     &sup3; Battalion, 187th Infanty Regiment, 101st Airborne Division  
     &sup3; during the brutal 10 day (May 11-20, 1969) battle for Hill  
     &sup3; 937 in the A Shau Valley of Vietnam as they try again and   
     &sup3; again to take the fortified hill held by the North          
     &sup3; Vietnamese, and the faults and casulties they take every    
     &sup3; time in which the battle was later dubbed "Hamburger Hill"  
     &sup3; because enem fire was so fierce that the fusillade of       
     &sup3; bullets turned assaulting troops into shreded hamburger     
     &sup3; meat.
